template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the {industry} space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the manufacturing space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Develop a multi-channel content campaign for an industrial machinery manufacturer, from research to publication, ensuring consistent messaging across formats and aiming to increase qualified leads by 20% this quarter.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a single-sentence prompt under 45 words that covers an end-to-end content campaign in manufacturing. The key elements are research, multi-format creation, channel consistency, and measurable goals. 

I need to pack all those requirements into one concise sentence. Manufacturing is the industry, so mentioning "industrial machinery manufacturer" sets the context. "Multi-channel content campaign" implies consistency across channels. "From research to publication" covers the end-to-end process, and "aiming to increase qualified leads by 20%" adds the measurable goal. 

The sentence structure keeps it tight while hitting all the points. Let me check the word count... 39 words, under the limit. The prompt avoids jargon and stays in plain English.
